Slow-tour.title: A Glimpse Of Bhutan
Slow-tour.tagline: Immerse yourself in Bhutan's rich cultural heritage
Slow-tour.description: Discover the authentic soul of Bhutan through its vibrant villages, warm homestays, and timeless traditions. This thoughtfully designed 7-day journey takes you from the bustling streets of Thimphu to the serene valleys of Punakha and the sacred heights of Tiger’s Nest, offering a genuine connection to the people, culture, and spirit of the Himalayas.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available at an additional cost of $240.

highlights: Visit iconic Tiger's Nest Monastery (Taktsang)
Explore ancient dzongs and fortresses in Paro, Thimphu, and Punakha
Stroll through lush valleys, rice terraces, and riverside trails
Experience local village life through an authentic homestay / farmhouse and discover Bhutanese art, culture, and cuisine with local families

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro, Travel to Thimphu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and drive to the capital city - Thimphu. Visit the Takin Preservation Centre and Sangaygang viewpoint for a scenic view of the Thimphu valley, if time permits. Enjoy a welcome dinner featuring traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Journey to Punakha Valley
itinerary.description: Begin the day with a visit to the towering Buddha Dordenma before traveling over the scenic Dochula Pass, where 108 chortens crown the mountain ridge. Continue to Punakha and take a gentle walk through Sopsokha village, past rice terraces and mustard fields, to reach the sacred Chimi Lhakhang Temple.

itinerary.title: Farm to Heart: Life in Punakha
itinerary.description: Spend the day embracing the simple rhythms of rural life in Punakha. Join your hosts in daily farm activities, from milking cows and tending to paddy fields (seasonal) to learning how to cook a traditional Bhutanese meal.

itinerary.title: Colors of Village Life in Punakha
itinerary.description: Go on a slow guided stroll through the villages and witness the rhythm of everyday life of farmers tending rice fields to artisans weaving traditional textiles. In the afternoon, take part in a hands-on natural dyeing workshop where you’ll learn how locals use plants and minerals to create vibrant colors. Craft your own dyed fabric or scarf to take home as a unique Bhutanese souvenir.

itinerary.title: Discover Paro Town
itinerary.description: Travel from Punakha to Paro and enjoy a leisurely day exploring the town’s charming streets, traditional arts and crafts stores, and cozy local cafés. Take time to relax and prepare for tomorrow’s iconic Tiger’s Nest hike.

itinerary.title: Tiger’s Nest Adventure & Hot Stone Bath
itinerary.description: Rise early for the iconic hike to Tiger’s Nest Monastery, perched dramatically on the cliffside. After descending, unwind with a soothing traditional hot stone bath, a perfect way to relax and reflect on your journey through Bhutan.

itinerary.title: Farewell Bhutan
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of Bhutan’s culture, landscapes, and warm hospitality.

notIncluded: Tips for guide and driver (optional but appreciated)

bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Moderate fitness required for hiking activities

cultural-tour.title: A Glimpse Of Bhutan
cultural-tour.tagline: Immerse yourself in Bhutan's rich cultural heritage
cultural-tour.description: Experience the spiritual heart of Bhutan through its ancient monasteries, vibrant festivals, and deeply rooted Buddhist traditions. This carefully crafted journey takes you through the kingdom's most sacred sites while connecting you with local communities and their timeless way of life.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Single supplement available at an additional cost of $240.

highlights: Visit iconic Tiger's Nest Monastery (Taktsang)
Explore ancient dzongs and fortresses
Experience local village life and homestay
Walk through pristine pine forests to remote temples

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro, Travel to Thimphu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and take a 45 mins - 1hr ride to the capital city - Thimphu. Evening orientation and welcome dinner with traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Paro Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Paro Dzong, one of Bhutan's most impressive fortresses, and explore the National Museum. Afternoon visit to Kyichu Lhakhang, one of the oldest temples in Bhutan.

itinerary.title: Tiger's Nest Monastery Hike
itinerary.description: Embark on the iconic hike to Taktsang Monastery (Tiger's Nest), perched on a cliff 900m above the valley. This spiritual journey takes 4-5 hours round trip with breathtaking views.

itinerary.title: Paro to Thimphu
itinerary.description: Drive to Thimphu, Bhutan's capital. Visit the Memorial Chorten, Buddha Dordenma statue, and explore the weekend market if traveling Friday-Sunday.

itinerary.title: Thimphu Cultural Experience
itinerary.description: Deep dive into Bhutanese culture with visits to traditional arts and crafts schools, papermaking factory, and textile museums. Evening cultural show with mask dances.

itinerary.title: Village Homestay Experience
itinerary.description: Travel to a traditional Bhutanese village for an authentic homestay experience. Participate in daily activities, learn to cook local dishes, and connect with your host family.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure flight, carrying memories of Bhutan's rich cultural heritage.

bookingInfo.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 30 days before departure
bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Moderate fitness required for hiking activities

mountain-biking.title: Bhutan Mountain Biking & Cultural Adventure
mountain-biking.tagline: Cycle through Bhutan’s scenic valleys and cultural heartlands
mountain-biking.description: Pedal through Bhutan’s breathtaking landscapes, from the lush Paro Valley to the serene Punakha Valley, while experiencing authentic village life and cultural highlights. This 8-day journey combines mountain biking adventure with immersive cultural encounters.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Bike and gear included.

highlights: Cycle through Paro and Punakha Valleys with breathtaking views
Ride over scenic mountain passes including Dochula Pass
Participate in village homestay and traditional cooking workshop
Experience Bhutanese culture, temples, and dzongs along the way
Professional cycling guide with support vehicle
Quality mountain bikes and safety gear provided

itinerary.title: Arrival in Paro & Bike Orientation
itinerary.description: Arrive at Paro International Airport and meet your cycling guide. Get fitted for your mountain bike and take a short test ride around Paro Valley (~5km, minimal elevation, 30-45 minutes) to get familiar with your bike and surroundings. Enjoy a welcome dinner featuring traditional Bhutanese cuisine.

itinerary.title: Paro Valley Ride
itinerary.description: Warm-up ride through the scenic Paro Valley (~25km, ~300m elevation gain, 3-4 hours). Visit cultural landmarks including Paro Dzong and local temples, while soaking in panoramic views of the valley and surrounding mountains.

itinerary.title: Paro to Thimphu via Chele La Pass
itinerary.description: Cycle from Paro to Thimphu (~40km, ~1,000m ascent to Chele La Pass at 3,988m, ~900m descent to Thimphu, 6-7 hours). Experience breathtaking Himalayan vistas on the ascent and a thrilling downhill ride to Thimphu. This is the most challenging ride of the tour, suited for cyclists with good stamina.

itinerary.title: Thimphu to Punakha Ride
itinerary.description: Enjoy a scenic ride from Thimphu to Punakha (~35km, ~600m ascent to Dochula Pass, ~600m descent to Punakha, 5-6 hours). Pause at Dochula Pass for photos and panoramic views. If time permits, take a short detour through Sopsokha village to Chimi Lhakhang before reaching your homestay.

itinerary.title: Punakha Village Experience
itinerary.description: A restful day of authentic village immersion. Participate in farm activities and enjoy a hands-on cooking workshop, preparing a traditional Bhutanese dish with your host family. Gentle village cycling optional (~15-20km, minimal elevation, 2-3 hours).

itinerary.title: Return to Paro
itinerary.description: Travel by private vehicle from Punakha to Paro (~4 hours). Spend the afternoon relaxing at your boutique hotel and exploring Paro town at a leisurely pace in preparation for tomorrow’s iconic hike. No cycling today.

itinerary.title: Tiger’s Nest Hike
itinerary.description: Rise early for the legendary hike to Tiger’s Nest Monastery (~10km round trip, ~900m elevation gain, 4-5 hours). After the hike, relax with an optional hot stone bath or a gentle stroll around Paro town.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Paro Airport for your departure, carrying unforgettable memories of Bhutan’s landscapes, culture, and cycling adventure.

included: Support vehicle and private transportation throughout
whatToBring: Warm layers for mornings and evenings

bookingInfo.fitnessLevel: Advanced fitness level required for mountain biking and moderate fitness level required for hiking activities

relaxation-tour.title: Relaxation & Wellness Tour
relaxation-tour.tagline: Rejuvenate your mind, body and spirit
relaxation-tour.description: Unwind in Bhutan's tranquil environment with yoga, meditation, spa treatments, and gentle nature walks. Perfect for those seeking peace and renewal.

pricing.note: Based on double occupancy. Spa treatments included.

highlights: Daily yoga and meditation sessions
Traditional hot stone bath therapy
Spa treatments with local herbs
Gentle nature walks
Mindfulness workshops
Healthy Bhutanese cuisine
Peaceful temple visits

itinerary.title: Arrival and Welcome
itinerary.description: Arrive in Paro, transfer to wellness resort. Welcome tea and orientation.

itinerary.title: Wellness Program Begins
itinerary.description: Morning yoga, spa consultation, afternoon meditation, evening hot stone bath.

itinerary.title: Mindfulness Day
itinerary.description: Guided meditation, mindfulness walk in nature, spa treatment, healthy cooking class.

itinerary.title: Cultural Wellness
itinerary.description: Visit peaceful temples, blessing ceremony, traditional medicine consultation.

itinerary.title: Nature Immersion
itinerary.description: Gentle forest walk, riverside meditation, herbal spa treatment.

itinerary.title: Deep Relaxation
itinerary.description: Full day of spa treatments, yoga nidra, silent reflection time.

itinerary.title: Thimphu Wellness
itinerary.description: Transfer to Thimphu wellness center, traditional massage, meditation.

itinerary.title: Integration Day
itinerary.description: Morning yoga, create personal wellness plan, farewell ceremony.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning meditation, transfer to airport with renewed spirit.
